title: Ladder Game
description: Randomly match participants with outcomes for quick ladder draws.

placeholder.participants:
Enter participants, one per line
Example: Alice
Bob
placeholder.results:
Enter outcomes, one per line
Example: Winner
Loser

helper.participants: Separate names with commas or new lines.
helper.results: Leave empty to auto-generate Result 1, Result 2, and more.

openGraph.title: Ladder Game
openGraph.description: Create a quick ladder draw by matching participants with outcomes at random.
